params._existing: address of the position we want to clone
params._initialCol: initial collateral to be posted by owner (dec 18)
params._initialMint: initial amount to mint before fees/reserve by owner
params._owner: owner address of the new clone

returns._0: address of the newly created clone position

clonePosition(address,address,address,ui.notice: clone an existing position. This can be a clone of another clone, or an origin position. If it's another clone, then the liquidation price is taken from the clone and the rest from the origin. Limit is "inherited" (and adjusted) from the origin.
